blogs.title: DevFest Kenya
blogs.body: GDG DevFest  the exciting topics and a world-class conference experience.A Github token must be created in order for Semantic Release to be able to publish a new release to the Github repository.
blogs.author: Ngesa

blogs.title: GDG KISII
blogs.body: The Google Developer Group (GDG) Kisii Chapter is for tech enthusiasts, makers, software artisans and creators who are interested in learning, sharing and getting to know more of Google developer tools & technologies.So if you would like to dive deeper into Google's developer technologies; everything from the Android, Firebase, Chrome, App Engine, HTML5, to product APIs like the YouTube API, Maps API and Chart Tools, then join our amazing community!
blogs.author: Jumah

blogs.title: Android Basics in Kotlin
blogs.body: Welcome to Android Basics in Kotlin! In this course, you'll learn the basics of building Android apps with the Kotlin programming language. Along the way, you'll develop a collection of apps to start your journey as an Android developer
blogs.author: Jumah
